bug.author: ahtsan
bug.summary: deterministic.set_seed does not guarantee full determinism in TensorFlow
bug.description: Determinism in TensorFlow depends on two seeds: Graph seed and op seed. Currently deterministic.set_seed() only set the graph seed, which makes the random sequences generated by all ops be repeatable across sessions, but not when sequences of ops changed. Setting both graph_seed and op_seed will guarantee full determinism, i.e. calling <denchmark-link:set_random_seed>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/compat/v1/set_random_seed</denchmark-link> and applying a seed when calling any tf.ops (e.g. ).
